body.name: Himosyber Women's Patchwork Dual Pocket Jumpsuit Loose Floral Print Bohemian Wide Leg Bib Overall
features: Button down closure, color block with ethnic aztec floral printed
Special bib pockets and 2 hand pockets, ruffle pleated, loose fit, ankle length, a layering-friendly pull on jumpsuit with handy patch pockets and subtly tapered wide leg

Each color has a NEW DESIGN SIDE ZIPPER. There is a zipper on the side that makes it easy to take off. Wear it over a tee or on its own for the bohemian effect ( the straps were designed to cover a bra)

Casual floral print button strap ethnic summer beach long lovely dungarees overall with pockets suitable for daily, dating, party, office, beach, vacation, club outifts wear, pair with t-shirt. There are two prints and different sizes of this ensemble, so please refer to the measurements in the last figure

❤Wash recommended: To keep the jumpsuit's design well, recommend washing with hand wash in cold water or dry clean, and hang dry, do not tumble dry, to prevent more shrinkage. Our overall will few shrink length after washing, so we added the predicted length shrinkage in the overall size. The overall will be baggy, you can try again after washing

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Too long? Shrink? Huge? It is a long pants overalls. This overall will a little bit shrink of length after washing, so we added the length of predicted shrinkage in the overall size. The overall will be baggy. You can try again after washing. What type of material was used? Floral overall is 65% Cotton& 35% Polyester. Solid overall is 100% Cotton. Has anyone tried handwashing and air drying vs washing machine? Wash recommended: To keep the jumpsuit's design well, recommend washing with machine wash in cold water or dry clean, and hang dry, to prevent more shrinkage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They’re comfy and light and they feel great. They look so cute!I will say be careful how you dry them, I line dry and somehow they magically went from needing to be hemmed, like gonna trip over them, to fitting just right…. Without hemming and without the dryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s just super cute
reviews.reviewText: Most of what I buy on Amazon is OK. None of it makes me really excited. Or I should say rarely. This thing came and it is so cute. I can’t believe it. Another person wrote that the material is not as soft as she would like, and I have to agree. It’s a slightly heavier cotton, which might be really good because maybe it will last longer. The legs are 4 inches too long so when it shrinks that will be great. I am 5’3” and wear a 10. I’s roomy almost too loose.I washed it in the machine on hand, wash, cold water and then hung it to dry. It is no longer 4 inches too long and it fits perfectly instead of very loosely now. I would recommend never ever in the dryer because it shrinks so much just being washed and line dried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars cute and comfy, shrinks
reviews.reviewText: heed the shrinking reviews!!! i purposely bought 1 size up. i have other clothes of similar fabric that wash/dry fine so i thought what the heck. prior to washing, it was super roomy and legs were long enough to need rolling up. crotch was low even on shortest strap buttons.washed and dried on delicates. it shrunk to slightly loose around the middle, straps shorter, legs now up to ankles, crotch still low ;) i really wish i took before and after pics. the fit difference was shocking!but in all fairness, the tag does say dry clean for best results.so, i can still wear it but i want it looser for the summer heat. and i like it enough that i’m going to order in another color to try washing and line drying. fingers crossed!for reference, i’m 5’-4”, normally a 16/18 in pants, 40b in bra.XL out of the bag, fit as baggy as i wouldve liked, but legs were long. didnt want to risk shrinking so returned.XXL out of the bag (which i kept and washed), described above.honestly, with the amount of shrinking, i wish they had XXXL.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this asap.
reviews.reviewText: Love love love! They’re incredibly unique looking and bring out my inner arty boho aesthetic. I'm 5’4’’ and 140 lbs give/take and I sized up to a medium after reading about the pant legs being short and I wanted a baggy look. I could’ve gotten away with a size down but the legs would’ve been more like capris. The back is not flattering though so it’s something I’ll have to accept or find a cute belt for. They have two buttons for the shoulder straps too if you want them hanging further down or higher up. Super comfy and stylish. Definitely recommend buying these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars #1 Blue XL size
reviews.reviewText: Size XLPros:Beautiful design. Good color pigmentation. Good construction. Fabric is good thickness although it feels thin at first. Worth the $20 if you do need to alter it for a better fit.There are two button rows so it is somewhat height adjustable.Cons: The fabric is somewhat stiff and itchy. The crotch sits low and awkward. The legs are long for short people. If you are 5'5 and you will need it hemmed/cuffed or a shoe with a decent sole if you don't want it dragging on the floor.The sewed on buttons may need some reinforcement so they don't fall off if you choose to wash it. I would wash on cold on the delicate/hand wash cycle with low spin then hang dry to keep from tearing it up or shrinking it. I would only put this on low or no heat in a dryer.I haven't washed it yet. Stay tuned. I ordered an XL just in case. I tried it on over a pair of joggers to make sure it had room to shrink and still fit me. I'm 5'4 1/2 and roughly a size 16 in pants. I'm a 38 D and will need to wear a top.Edit: I washed in cold and tumble dried with no heat. It shrunk. You will need to buy 2 sizes up if you plan to wash this in the machine. The tag (attached on the outside) says dry clean or machine wash but apparently NOT SO. The tag sewn on the inside the pants says dry clean???. So now it fits awkward and fabric is itchy. I'm pear shaped. The legs are now TOO short, crotch still long and since I'm short torso/ bottom heavy it's tighter around my hips and midsection. One button came off also. I can wear it around the house but not outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these! Don't put in dryer!
reviews.reviewText: These are very comfortable and lightweight! They were very roomy and a little long when I first received them. I buttoned on the top button. I washed them and hung to dry. Good thing I didn't put them in the dryer because they shrunk up considerably. They still fit well, with room...just not so baggy. The length also shrank. I now button on the bottom button. They are now a little shorter than I'd like. They are fine with flip flops but with sneakers or sandals with a small heel I would like them longer. I am going to crochet trim on the hem of them to add about 1". If you want to dry them in the dryer, you might consider buying a size up. I still love them and might buy more. I got lot's of compliments on the orange ones today! Photos are before washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for pottery class!!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these overalls. Comfy, great material, just all-around best pair ever. I get clay and sludge on them when I’m throwing pottery, and it all washes out in the laundry. I do wash them in cold water and hang them to dry, just because I don’t want to take the chance on shrinking them, but so far they haven’t. The fabric is not super soft, but not scratchy either. Similar to linen instead of cotton. They’re not a fashion statement, but you just can’t beat them for comfort and durability.
Muy grande comprendo que es holgado pero es demasiado amplio
Ok ladies this is super comfy. 2 things to keep in mind size up. It’s 100% cotton so hang it to dry. I haven’t washed mine yet. So not sure how it will wash up.
These light overalls are so comfy and I love the cotton floral fabric. Fit is good. I am a size 16 Australian woman.
Arrived on time as advertised - very happy with the sale
Hard wearing, yet comfortable fabric. Great fit
